descripcion:
This is the traditional fairy tale Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs by The Brothers Grimm adapted for children and narrated in Spanish and English. Excellent for kids and adults all levels. Narrated in a slow pace by a Spanish native speaker. The audio includes a keyword list and three questions at the end to motivate conversation. Hope you enjoy them. Vamos allá! Let´s go!
Please note: This audiobook is in Spanish and English.
